skills.name: Drink Invite
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Libation of Sweetness
skills.desc: Upon taking a killing blow, deals Physical DMG to adjacent friendly units, increases their SPD, and inflicts them with Bleed.

skills.name: Hearty Revelry
skills.desc: Upon being attacked or taking DMG from DoT effects, gains a stack of SoulGlad Revel. Each stack increases DMG dealt.
